subject: Millrose Games
Football
Track and Field
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Willie Gault and Tim Dwight have known the thrill of running with the football in the Super Bowl. On Friday, they will recapture the art of bursting out of the blocks as sprinters in the Millrose Games.
snippet: Willie Gault and Tim Dwight have known the thrill of running with the football in the Super Bowl. On Friday, they will recapture the art of bursting out of the blocks as sprinters in the Millrose Games.
